Articles.Content:
Does anyone play here Gmod?

I have it buyed and im playing it.

And i know how to make a private server.

Just asking.

I have it. Don't play it much because of KSP.

I'm addicted to KSP...
I have over 100 hours on it, but haven't played it since gmod 13 came out.

Bought it, and cannot play anything in multi.

freezes at a blank white server list.

Also, massive performance issues, but those are simply my system.

i do i do!

would you like an armored train?

search "Armored Train" on the steam workshop. my username is ariel_sharon

Be warned i am not the neatest builder...
